reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Developing the UK-China Clean Energy Partnership 2019 Work Plan

description.narrative: This project is designed to support the development of the UK-China Clean Energy Partnership 2019 Work Plan. It will set out the multi-year Prosperity Fund Energy and Low Carbon Economy Programme’s focus areas for 2019/2020. This will ensure that the programme remains in line with the overall objective of reducing global emissions by accelerating China’s energy transition to a sustainable, low carbon economy. This will also generate opportunities for international business in the Energy and Low Carbon sector, bringing potential benefits to British companies, in a sector where they are well placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
